entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 11:30 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
